name: Hologram Cat Kitten 3D Prank
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Hologram.
Hologram Cat Kitten 3D Prank - a game application is a joke, where you can play with the hologram kitten right on your phone!
Choose a cat or a cat will automatically connect the camera and the screen you will see a hologram!
Love lions and cats? Then call an hologram now! This is a very beautiful and interesting! You can pet a cat or a scratch, as well as play.
Make fun of your friends or relatives!
ATTENTION! The game does not bear any harm, it was created for fun and jokes!
Play our app for free and without having to connect to the Internet right now !!
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your feedback and we will make the game even better and more interesting for you!
